ca.sharcnet.dh.scriber.stringmatch

Class StringMatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.sharcnet.dh.scriber.stringmatch.StringMatch

  • public class StringMatch
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores a candidate (addCandidate(java.lang.String, ca.sharcnet.dh.sql.SQLRecord)) as a series of space deliminated tokens (a token by default is a word). Will attempt to match the maximum number of tokens in a query (seekLine(ca.sharcnet.dh.scriber.stringmatch.OnAccept, ca.sharcnet.dh.scriber.stringmatch.OnReject)).

    • Method Detail

      • addCandidate

        public void addCandidate(java.lang.String entity,
                         SQLRecord row)
        Enter a candidate string. If `case sensitive` is set to false the candidate is first converted to lower case. Tokens within the candidate are ignored. When the seekLine method is called the original string is passed to the consumer callback.
        Parameters:
        entity -
        row - The candidate string.

      • setSource

        public java.lang.String[] setSource(java.lang.String source)
        Set the string from which matches will be sought.
        Parameters:
        source -
        Returns:
        an array of all candidate strings
